name: Barbell Triceps Extension
how_to_perform:
1. Stand or sit with your back straight and feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Hold a barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
3. Extend the barbell straight up above you, keeping your elbows close to your head.
4. Lower the barbell behind your ears by bending your elbows until they are at a 90-degree angle or slightly below.
5. Pause briefly at the bottom of the movement.
6. Push the barbell back up to the starting position by extending your arms fully.
7. Keep your core engaged and your body stable throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Barbell Triceps Extension is an upper body exercise that primarily works the triceps muscle, involving extension and contraction.
